William Courtleigh Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Courtleigh_Jr. 0 William Courtleigh Jr. (1892–1918) was American silent film actor whose promising career was cut short after he fell victim to the 1918 flu pandemic. William_Courtleigh_Jr. ( 1892 – 1918 ) was American_silent_film_actor whose_promising_career was_cut short after he fell victim to the_1918_flu_pandemic .
